page.title: 14A DAY AT MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: My day begins when I get the bus from Honington to Ixworth Middle School. We play in the playground until the bell rings for registration. Our names are called individually by our teachers. On Mondays all 402 pupils go to assembly.The school head or deputy gives out notices and tells a short moral story. On other days we have a reading period where we read a book of our own choice. This is followed by 8 lessons each day,which include:Maths English,Science,French,Music,Drama.PE, Humanities,Art,Home Economics,Pottery, Craft Design & Technology and R.E. On Wednesdays a friend and I run the tuck shop at 10:30 (break time), which sells healthy snacks. Lunch is at 12:00 in the hall. We can eat packed-lunch or a school dinner. At 13:05 we register again and lessons finish at 15:30. We sometimes stay for club activities.
